job.title: Sr Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtAre you looking to join a groundfloor startup where your work makes an immediate impactltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtDo you want to be a part of a dynamic team with diverse backgrounds improving benefit offerings and the experience for employeesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtDo you want to be a part of the discussion and impact decisions that shape the future of the company you work forltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtOur ideal candidate is a selfmotivated problem solver who thrives in an open and collaborative environment You enjoy supporting and developing an application that will reinvent itself as and scale with market adaptationltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtDay to Day ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWriting clean highquality highperformance maintainable codeltligtltligtDevelop and support software including applications database integration interfaces and new functionality enhancementsltligtltligtDesign robust secure and scalable featuresltligtltligtCoordinate crossfunctionally to insure project meets business objectives and compliance standardsltligtltligtSupport test and deployment of new products and featuresltligtltligtParticipate in code reviewsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science or related field Extensive Experience in software engineering considered in lieu of degreeltligtltligt5 years of Ruby on Rails development experienceltligtltligtExperience working with relational databases MySQL preferredltligtltligtExpertise in front end technologies eg JavaScript CSS HTML and JQueryltligtltligtExperience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologiesltligtltligtAn analytical mind in addition to a problemsolving attitudeltligtltligtAbility to multitask organize and prioritize workltligtltulgt
